Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

  After a few months pass, with the majority of the Maximal fighting force on Earth, we return to a scene within Iacon's Chamber of Elders.
   
  All of the Elders are being franticly rushed into the room, which is on lockdown. Maximal soldiers are placed everywhere.
   
  Elder 1: What's the situation?
   
  Big Convoy: We'll try to keep you safe in here. The entire city is under siege. We don't have the man power to fight off the attack.
   
  Elder 2: So the G2 Decepticon Empire finally decided to attack Cybertron...?
   
  Big Convoy: They arn't the attackers.
   
  Elder 2: Then who...?
   
  Big Convoy: The Predacons. We always knew that the peace was uneasy. If the perfect chance arose, the Predacon government was sure to make a move. With the majority of our forces on Earth, it was time. They burned the Pax Cybertronia hard copy, in the town center, twenty clicks ago.
   
  Elder 1: You're saying that...
   
  Big Convoy looks up to the heavens, not wanting to say what he must.
   
  Big Convoy: The third Great War has begun...
   
  Elder 1: The Maximals and Predacons wage war across Cybertron...
   
  Elder 2: Like the Autobots and Decepticons before us...
   
  OOC: There you have it. The political situation on Cybertron has greatly changed.
  
       
---------------------------------
